mapper.update: update t_template_pact set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_resolution = #{imageResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_size = #{imageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_format = #{imageFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, type, name, image_url, image_resolution, image_size, image_format, content from t_template_pact where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
